io.delta.standalone.types

Class DataType

  • Object
    • io.delta.standalone.types.DataType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayType, BinaryType, BooleanType, ByteType, DateType, DecimalType, DoubleType, FloatType, IntegerType, LongType, MapType, NullType, ShortType, StringType, StructType, TimestampType

    public abstract class DataType
extends Object
    The base type of all io.delta.standalone data types. Represents a bare-bones Java implementation of the Spark SQL DataType, allowing Spark SQL schemas to be represented in Java.
